thread.title: Gianluca Vialli: My prediction for Chelsea v Arsenal
thread.title_full: Gianluca Vialli: My prediction for Chelsea v Arsenal

title: Gianluca Vialli: My prediction for Chelsea v Arsenal
text:
Click through the gallery for the predicted Chelsea line-up to face Arsenal The manager is a winner Gianluca Vialli 
And Vialli expects his former club to extend the gap on Arsenal. 
"I respect Arsenal, they have been quite consistent this season, losing only the first and last games," Vialli told talkSPORT. 
"But I can't see Chelsea not being able to beat them. GETTY Gianluca Vialli (left) believes Antonio Conte's Chelsea will beat Arsenal GETTY Conte's Chelsea sit nine points clear at the top of the table GETTY Arsenal beat Chelsea 3-0 earlier this season 
"They're too good at the moment. They're confident, tactically spot on. 
"The manager is a winner. I'm sure they will take advantage of playing at Stamford Bridge." 
Arsenal beat Chelsea 3-0 back in September, after which the Blues went on a 13-game winning streak in the Premier League. Related articles
